text:
Alrighty, so I have scenario I am hoping someone will have an answer too:

We task our internal people to blog for the company. problem is, they are missing deadlines for when those blogs are do. Whats the best way automated way to remind them of their upcoming blog and basically annoy them into getting it in on time.
I know we can do it in Sharepoint (our intranet) but looking to see if HS has something available
for example does the HS "Create Task" remind them when its overdue as well
it doesnt say anything about frequency notifications

Unfortunately we deal with the same issues and don't have a great solution. We're currently in the process of switching our PM software, which I'm hoping will help, and one of our requirements is an open API so I can write custom extensions for this kind of thing. We tried the built-in HS PM tools a long time ago and didn't find them robust enough for our processes. Would also be interested if anyone has a simple solution
<@U2H3TT8F2> are you using Gmail in house by any chance?
thats why i was going to go the sharepoint/workflows route with them
I got 99 problems but outlook ain’t one. feel bad for you bro
lol it's a blessing and a curse (more curse though)

Is your team open to PM software? We use JIRA and follow Agile. It’s completely transformed how we complete work (for both client projects and internal work) and has nearly eliminated missed deadlines and has really helped to hold people accountable.
Yea, we Accelo for our task management and JIRA as well, I think it's more of that "Oh it's for internal stuff not client so it's ok to put on hold for a bit" mentality that we're trying to break

Totally understand. We were in that same spot about 2 yrs ago. We actually now have ourselves as a client in JIRA and make sure to plan our agency-specific cards as part of our team’s capacity that way we’re sort of forced to complete those cards. It helps to keep it top of mind and helped to shift the focus from “not a client” to actually treating our agency as a client.

Yep we did the same in Accelo we have us as a client and tasks area assigned out. It's the best way to get internal work done. For most of the work its awesome, when it comes to blogging though, thats the only pain point
Hmmm okay. I’ll think on that. There has to be another way to help put it top of mind.

just saw a 20 something lady walk by the office window and walk in circles for like 2 minutes staring at her watch. all I can think is either she is really competitive with her fitbit competition or Tamagachi’s are making a come back. I’m hoping it’s the latter. Those things were awesome…. that is all.
